/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a smattering of green trees interspersed between the buildings. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, emphasizing the grandeur of the city and the rhythm of its daily life.
